Name: Coffin panel
Description: The panel from a coffin, made from wood and stucco and depicting two bearded deities sitting opposite one another with a 'kherep'-sign between. Both figures wear false beards and one has a yellow skin colour while the other has red. They are dressed alike with long tight fitting garments, again in different colours, and both have ornate collars. Below them is a blue band with stars drawn within it. Just above the bottom of the panel the top of some hieroglyphs can just be seen along with three disks.
